id: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; installation of three rooflights to front roofslope and a window within side gable wall (Application for a Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)

Formation of vehicle crossover; front extension; relocation of main entrance from side to front; two storey side extension; part single, part two storey side/rear extension with patio; hard landscaping; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension with glass balustrade, and installation of three rooflights to front roofslope
